project_plan.name: Weather Information Fetcher
project_plan.description: Implement a Python program that fetches and displays current weather information for a specified city using a public API.

task.name: Implement the feature to fetch weather data from the public API
Parse the JSON response to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Implement a function to display the weather information in the terminal
Write tests for the fetching and parsing functionalities
Execute tests on the implemented features to ensure they function correctly
